definition: The "Nobelpreis" is a prestigious international award given annually in recognition of outstanding achievements in various fields. It is typically awarded to individuals or organizations that have made significant contributions to areas such as science, literature, peace, economics, or medicine.

examples.german: Der Nobelpreis wird jedes Jahr in verschiedenen Kategorien verliehen.
examples.english: The Nobel Prize is awarded every year in various categories.

examples.german: Marie Curie erhielt den Nobelpreis f端r Physik im Jahr 1903.
examples.english: Marie Curie received the Nobel Prize in Physics in 1903.

examples.german: Der Nobelpreis f端r Literatur wird f端r herausragende schriftstellerische Leistungen vergeben.
examples.english: The Nobel Prize in Literature is awarded for outstanding literary achievements.

examples.german: Albert Einstein erhielt den Nobelpreis f端r Physik im Jahr 1921.
examples.english: Albert Einstein received the Nobel Prize in Physics in 1921.

examples.german: Der Nobelpreis ist eine der renommiertesten Auszeichnungen weltweit.
examples.english: The Nobel Prize is one of the most prestigious awards worldwide.
